statements: SELECT * FROM user_data
SELECT username, encrypted_email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT username, encrypted_email, encrypted_password FROM user_data ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE encrypted_email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username,encrypted_email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY encrypted_email DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE encrypted_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT username,encrypted_password FROM user_data WHERE encrypted_password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY username ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT password, username FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 2);
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, data FROM user_data JOIN users ON users.id = user_data.user_id;
SELECT u.username, ud.data FROM users u JOIN user_data ud ON u.id = ud.user_id WHERE u.id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT u.id, u.username, ud.encrypted_data FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_data ud ON u.id = ud.user_id WHERE u.username LIKE '%smith%' ORDER BY u.id DESC;
SELECT u.username, ud.data FROM users u JOIN user_data ud ON u.id = ud.user_id WHERE u.id IN (1, 2, 3) AND u.username != 'admin' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT u.id, u.username, COUNT(ud.data) AS data_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_data ud ON u.id = ud.user_id GROUP BY u.id HAVING data_count > 1 ORDER BY data_count DESC,u.id ASC;
SELECT id, username, password FROM users;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT first_name, email FROM user_profile WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT user_id, encrypted_data FROM user_data;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profile WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT users.id, users.username, user_profile.first_name, user_profile.last_name, user_data.encrypted_data FROM users JOIN user_profile ON users.id = user_profile.user_id JOIN user_data ON users.id = user_data.user_id WHERE users.username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profile ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM user_personal_info ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT credit_card_number, expiration_date FROM user_payment_info WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'Dark';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_personal_info ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.full_name, pi.credit_card_number FROM users u JOIN user_personal_info p ON u.id = p.user_id JOIN user_payment_info pi ON u.id = pi.user_id WHERE u.id = 1;
SELECT p.theme, p.language FROM users u JOIN user_preferences p ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM credit_cards ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT id, data_type FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE id < 5);
SELECT cc.card_number, cc.expiration_date, u.username FROM credit_cards cc JOIN users u ON cc.user_id = u.id;
SELECT l.id, u.username, l.login_time, l.logout_time FROM login_logs l JOIN users u ON l.user_id = u.id ORDER BY l.login_time DESC;
